name: 2D Shooter (yuenchi)
description:
Modifications:  Adding a life counter, adding a substantial amount of enemies to ramp up the game massively (as early as level 2). 2 additional levels will be added to test the player's reaction speed and maneuverability.

Player movement, invincibility, and shooting speed will be slowed to increase difficulty. Outer wall will be scaled down to limit player space and encourage taking on the enemy head on. Objects are scattered throughout the play area to give the player some cover against the enemy. 

Main menu background will be changed to fit the aesthetic of the game. Volume of the audio and soundtrack will be adjusted to avoid blowing out eardrums.

There will be more planned modifications. If any modifications I made are not present in this description, I will specifically mention them in the description of the modded game page.
